contract that locks tokens for a beneficiary with multi-signature release mechanism. The tokens are released gradually according to a vesting schedule, and each release requires approval from multiple authorized signers.","kind":"dev","methods":{"addSigner(address)":{"details":"Add a params._signer: Address of the signer to add

params._requestId: ID of the release request to approve

calculateReleasableAmount().details: Calculate the amount of tokens that can be released

returns._0: The amount of tokens that can be released

changeRequiredApprovals(uint256).details: Change the required number of approvals

constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the vesting contract

params._requiredApprovals: Number of approvals required to release tokens
params._tokenAddress: Address of the ERC20 token to be vested

params._duration: Duration of the vesting period in seconds
params._startTime: Start time of the vesting period
params._totalAmount: Total amount of tokens to be vested

params._signer: Address of the signer to remove

revoke().details: Revoke the vesting schedule Only the owner can revoke the vesting schedule
